- EconomyManager.cs: Added Transaction properties \(BalanceBefore, Verified, etc.\)
- GameStateProvider.cs: Added ElectionEmpire.News.Translation using statement
- ElectionManager.cs: Added parameterless constructor and Initialize method
- GameSceneInitializer.cs: Fixed invalid MonoBehaviour lookups
- FallbackSystem.cs: Renamed IGameStateProvider to IFallbackGameStateProvider
